GeneDef.label: cyclically self-learning
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that cyclically develop the carrier's neural connections, extracting experience from the psy-field.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every (*DateTime)1-2 days(/DateTime) increases one random <color=#8a8ae6>skill</color> by one <color=#8a8ae6>level</color>, maximum 20.
Skills related to <color=#8a8ae6>passion</color> have a higher priority regardless of <color=#8a8ae6>aptitudes</color>.
